name: outclimb
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to climb a mountain, tree, etc. better or faster than someone else: She won the gold medal in the speed climbing competition, outclimbing all the other competitors with ease. They are extremely agile animals and can outrun and outclimb any predators.
More examplesFewer examplesIt was a great day in the mountains but I felt that I had been completely out-climbed by the rest of the group.They really pushed themselves to the limit in their preparations for the ascent, constantly trying to outclimb each other.He outclimbed all comers to win the annual tree-climbing competition.
